title: Meghalaya engaging with Bangladesh for submarine cable to Shillong Tech Park from Chittagong port - Economic Times
content: Meghalaya engaging with Bangladesh for submarine cable to Shillong Tech Park from Chittagong port  Economic Times
description: Speaking at the inaugural ceremony, the Meghalaya CM said that Shillong Technology Park is one of the 300 ambitious projects of the State Government, which will be inaugurated in 2022 as part of Meghalayas Golden Jubilee year.
